# UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.HeaderMode.supplementary

**Case**

A header mode that uses supplementary views to show headers.

## Declaration

```swift
case supplementary
```

## Discussion

Choose this header mode to use supplementary views with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionView/elementKindSectionHeader] as the section header.

By default, lists that use the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration-swift.struct/Appearance-swift.enum/plain] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration-swift.struct/Appearance-swift.enum/sidebarPlain] list appearances use pinned headers. You must use this header mode if you want to opt into this default pinning behavior.

## Header modes

- **UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.HeaderMode.none**: No headers are shown.
- **UICollectionLayoutListConfiguration.HeaderMode.firstItemInSection**: A header mode that styles the first item in a section as a header.
